title: Elon Musk Updates Twitter Bio To 'Bitcoin,' Cryptocurrency Skyrockets

title: Tesla Model S upgrade comes with super fast Plaid Mode and 520 miles of range
text: Tesla has added some new upgrades to its Model S sedan, including a new rectangular steering wheel that looks like it belongs in a race car or an airplane, and its new super fast Plaid Mode with an option for an extended 520-mile driving range.

title: Will Tesla Miss Out on Inclusion in the S&P 500 ESG Index?
text: Tesla (NasdaqGS: TSLA) is already in the S&P 500, but the electric carmaker may not make the cut for exchange traded funds tracking the S&P 500 ESG Index. Tesla has been at the forefront of the electric vehicles industry and broadly associated with clean energy technology, but that does not automatically make it a sustainable [.

title: Don't Sweat Tesla's Earnings Miss — Its Bull Thesis Is Stronger Than Ever
text: Tesla missed earnings estimates. So what? This company is still redefining the multi-trillion-dollar energy industry, so buy TSLA stock.

title: Tesla Stock Is Overvalued, But Shows No Signs of Slowing
text: The hype is understandable, but Tesla stock is extremely overvalued right now. Investors should let the stock come back to earth.

title: Elon Musk expects Tesla to lead the solar market soon
text: Elon Musk, CEO of Tesla, believes that the electric automaker will soon be the market leader in solar. During the company's fourth-quarter earnings call on Wednesday, Musk said there were a few years where the company, including the team that works on solar, was devoted to building and producing Tesla's Model 3, the company's first mass-market vehicle.

title: GM's EV-only goal is 'shot across the bow' at Tesla: analyst
text: General Motors Co.'s aiming to offer only electric cars by 2035 and phasing out internal combustion-engine vehicles around that time is a "shot across the bow" at Tesla Inc. and other EV makers amid government tailwinds, analyst Dan Ives with Wedbush said in a note Thursday. The plan, announced earlier Thursday, is a sign that GM "will be aggressively going after EVs and is not just talking the talk with this latest news," he said.

title: Tesla Hits Brake After Dismal Q4 Earnings: ETFs to Watch
text: Tesla missed earnings estimates for the first time since the June 2019 quarter though the results represent the sixth straight profitable quarter.

title: China Is Preparing to Challenge Tesla
text: In the business world, healthy competition can help spur innovation. China is looking to one-up Tesla in the autonomous driving space, which could help the Global X Autonomous & Electric Vehicles ETF (DRIV).

title: Why Tesla Stock Fell on Thursday
text: The company reporting 46% year-over-year revenue growth for its fourth quarter, but shares are still trading lower following the quarterly update.

title: Capital In Motion: A Day After Selloff, Markets Digest Apple, Tesla, Facebook Earnings
text: This morning, investors have a lot to chew on besides the readjustment of capital stemming from short squeezes. There's also concern about the economic recovery, wariness over high stock valuations, and focus on mixed economic data.

title: Tesla (TSLA) Q4 Earnings Miss, Delivery Guidance Unclear
text: While Tesla (TSLA) manages to post profit for the sixth consecutive quarter, investors feel let down over the company's lower-than-expected earnings and vague delivery guidance for 2021.

text: The major stock indexes were mixed Thursday morning, but quiet following a rough Wednesday, even as short-squeeze stocks remained in focus.

title: Tesla Semi production on hold until company can make its own batteries
text: Elon Musk said Tesla won't mass manufacture its Semi, a heavy duty truck, until the company can produce high volumes of its own battery cells.

title: Wall Street expects Tesla's deliveries to rise by at least 50% in 2021
text: Wall Street analysts on Thursday estimated Tesla Inc will hand over at least 50% more vehicles in 2021, a day after the electric carmaker disappointed investors by holding back on providing clear delivery targets.

title: The Ratings Game: Analysts brush aside Tesla margin worries: You gotta spend more to make more
text: Shares of Tesla are slumping 7% in premarket trade, after the electric-car maker's results were disappointing on the earnings and sales side and gross margins were weaker.

title: Tesla stock slumps 8% after 4th-quarter earnings fall short of forecasts
text: Tesla shares fell as much as 8% in premarket trading on Thursday, after the automaker reported fourth-quarter earnings on Wednesday that fell short of Wall Street's forecasts. Elon Musk's electric-car company grew its revenues by 46% year-on-year to $10.7 billion. However, its adjusted earnings per share were $0.80 — below the $1.01 expected by analysts.

title: The Sustainable Version of the S&P 500 Might Not Include Tesla. What It Means for Investors.
text: Although the electric-car maker has been a pioneer in clean energy, that doesn't automatically make it a sustainable company in the eyes of S&P Dow Jones Indices.

title: Tesla could 'easily' start producing its Semi truck now, but it doesn't yet have enough battery cells to power them, Elon Musk said
text: It "would not make sense" for Tesla to start making its Semi electric truck right now, even though it could "easily" launch production, the company's CEO Elon Musk said Wednesday. The electric car maker doesn't have enough battery cells for the Tesla Semi, Musk said in a fourth-quarter earnings call.

title: TSLA Stock Price Falls Over 5% Pre-Market: Why It Happened
text: The stock price of Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) is trading at under 5% pre-market. This is why it happened.

title: Elon Musk Says Tesla Valuation Justified If Utility Of Robotaxis Is Factored
text: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) CEO Elon Musk said the company's more than $800 billion valuation is justified as there is a “roadmap” to it. What Happened: Musk's back of the envelope math revolves around an assumed shipment of $50 or $60 billion worth of vehicles and those vehicles becoming Full Self-Driving and get deployed as robotaxis.

title: 7 Electric Vehicle Stocks Making Headlines As Alt-Fuels Stoke Growth Niche
text: EV stocks that are likely to remain in limelight as the industry continues to grow at a robust pace in the next decade. These seven should be considered for your portfolio niche.
